data.title: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd's Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd have been married since 2017 and share three children. Here's a complete timeline of the couple's relationship.
data.text:
Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd's relationship goes back way before the ballroom.

The couple, known for their professional status on Dancing with the Stars, first met on Broadway in 2009. However, their relationship didn't turn romantic until 2012 ‚Äî a year after they'd reunited on ABC's hit reality dance competition.

Following a brief breakup, Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd tied the knot in July 2017 and have started a family. They welcomed their first child, son Shai Aleksander, in January 2017, their second son, Rio John, in June 2023 and their third son, Milan Maksim, in July 2024.

From their time on Broadway together to starting a family, here's a breakdown of Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd's lengthy love story.

July 2009: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd meet on Broadway

Prior to stepping into the Dancing with the Stars spotlight, Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd both landed gigs in the Broadway production of Burn the Floor in 2009 ‚Äî and interestingly, it wasn't love at first sight for the now-married couple.

"I thought he was arrogant," Murgatroyd told PEOPLE in a 2015 interview of meeting the Ukrainian dancer.

"Okay, that's a defense mechanism. I think she was in love with me at first sight and just doesn't want to admit it," Chmerkovskiy retorted. "No, I walked in the way I walk in and ‚Ä¶ it's just a lot of presence."

"I learned to like him because I found out he wasn't that arrogant," admitted Murgatroyd. "He was really generous to the entire cast, and our friendship grew and grew."

May 2011: Peta Murgatroyd joins Maks Chmerkovskiy on Dancing with the Stars

While Chmerkovskiy joined DWTS as a pro dancer in 2006, Murgatroyd joined the DWTS cast in 2011. She started as a troupe dancer in season 12 and was then promoted to the professional cast the following season.

Murgatroyd told PEOPLE in 2017, "there was always an attraction" between the two dancers, but because he was engaged to his fellow DWTS pro dancer Karina Smirnoff and she was dating her future DWTS costar Damian Whitewood at the time, "there was nothing ever done about it."

June 16, 2012: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd go Instagram official

Before their relationship budded into something more, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy built a solid friendship. When the two were both single in 2012, they began going on "friendship dates," according to Murgatroyd.

Murgatroyd made their relationship Instagram official that year as she posted a photo of her beau kissing her on the cheek.

Jan. 1, 2013: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd ring in the New Year together

The couple celebrated New Year's Eve together as they rang in 2013. Murgatroyd posted a photo alongside Chmerkovskiy and friends as they celebrated the occasion.

"Celebrating NYE with amazing people!" she captioned the photo.

November 2013: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd break up

Things were going strong for the pair until, as Murgatroyd put it, "out of nowhere," Chmerkovskiy called it quits after less than a year of dating.

"My heart was broken," Murgatroyd told PEOPLE in 2017. "But when we were driving to the airport after the breakup talk, he literally asked me why I was taking all my bags and clothes back. I was like, 'We just broke up. Why would I leave anything behind?' That's when I knew it wasn't really over for forever."

"I realized right away that I'd made a mistake," said Chmerkovskiy. "So I would take every opportunity to hover around."

October 2014: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd get back together

While Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd both dated other people during their brief time apart, the two rekindled their relationship in October 2014.

"They've never really 'broken up,' " a DWTS source told PEOPLE in 2015 about the professional dancers. "They're with each other a lot and have been for quite some time, including all last season. Tommy [Chong] would tease her about it."

April 22, 2015: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd publicly confirm they are back together

The couple appeared happier than ever when they posed for a selfie together in celebration of DWTS' 10th anniversary in 2015. Murgatroyd shared the picture on her Instagram featuring the two cheek to cheek with her arm wrapped around Chmerkovskiy.

Dec. 5, 2015: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd get engaged

Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd got engaged during an episode of DWTS on Dec. 5, 2015.

Naturally, the proposal happened on the dance floor during a performance of Sway at the Olympia Theater in Miami, in front of a joyous audience and a line of other dancers.

Chmerkovskiy told her, "I'm in love with you, and I will be in love with you for the rest of my life."

"She said 'yes,' " he wrote in another Instagram post later that night.

Jan. 4, 2017: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd welcome their first baby

After months of posting beautiful maternity pictures to her Instagram and documenting her pregnancy journey, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy welcomed son Shai Aleksander on Jan. 4, 2017.

"This is, without a doubt, the best thing that has ever happened to us!" the couple said of their firstborn in a statement at the time.

July 8, 2017: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd get married

Prior to lavishly celebrating their wedding with family and friends, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy secretly tied the knot during a small city hall ceremony in New York City on July 8, 2017. It wasn't until the couple was celebrating their one-year wedding anniversary that the Ukrainian dancer revealed their little secret on Instagram.

"This was one of the most exciting days of my life!" the DWTS pro wrote alongside two videos documenting the intimate ceremony. "Everything felt very festive, I couldn't take my eyes off my future wife the whole ride to the City Hall and it was as if New York City herself was marrying us."

July 8, 2017: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd have a wedding ceremony

On July 8, the dancing duo tied the knot (again) at Oheka Castle in Long Island, New York.

"Maks has loved this place for years and I took on the suggestion and I fell in love with it immediately," Murgatroyd told PEOPLE in May of choosing Oheka Castle.

Murgatroyd walked down the aisle on the arm of her father in a fairytale ball gown with an off-the-shoulder fitted bodice and multi-tiered, full gathered skirt.

Chmerkovskiy's brother and fellow DWTS pro, Val Chmerkovskiy, served as best man. Other DWTS wedding guests included Tony Dovolani, Rumer Willis, Sharna Burgess ‚Äî all of whom were in the wedding party ‚Äî as well as Jenna Johnson, Nyle DiMarco and Candace Cameron Bure.

March 2018: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd go on tour together

About a year after giving birth, Murgatroyd embarked on a tour alongside Chmerkovskiy and his brother Val in 2018. The traveling show, Maks, Val and Peta Live on Tour, toured 49 cities and featured special guests along the way.

Oct. 9, 2019: Maks Chmerkovskiy supports Peta Murgatroyd during U.S. citizenship ceremony

In 2019, Murgatroyd shared her excitement when she officially became a U.S. citizen ‚Äî a monumental moment for the New Zealand native.

"I love the life I created, but it wouldn't be possible without the United States giving me the chance to succeed and live in the best country in the world, where dreams really do come true," Murgatroyd wrote in a lengthy, emotional Instagram post.

"This country gave me my career, it's where I found the love of my life, and it's where my first child was born. This will always be home now," she added.

July 8, 2020: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd celebrate their wedding anniversary

In honor of their seventh dating anniversary, Murgatroyd posted a beautiful tribute to remember the day.

"It's been over 7 years and I'm still head over heels for you @maksimc ‚ú® Happy Anniversary my love," she captioned a series of wedding photos.

Chmerkovskiy displayed his love for his wife as well by posting romantic note cards he penned to Murgatroyd. The carousel ended with a toast shared between the loved-up couple.

Jan. 2, 2021: Peta Murgatroyd shares her appreciation for Maks Chmerkovskiy

At the start of 2021, Murgatroyd took the time to write a heartfelt note to Chmerkovskiy in a "husband appreciation post" on Instagram.

"My love...may we always be able to work through every challenge that's given to us," she wrote. "I love how we communicate and convey our feelings, connect when we feel a disconnect, instinctually know when each other is upset and reason with each other and come out more in love on the other side."

She added, "I woke up more obsessed with you than last year and for that I'm grateful ü§ó May we continue to put each other first and continue to grow and learn from one another. I love us and I'm ready for whatever 2021 has in store for us....Just wanted to say it here."

Jan. 9, 2022: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd vacation in Hawaii

The couple rang in the New Year with a tropical getaway to Hawaii. Murgatroyd shared a roundup of photos on her Instagram of her family enjoying time on the beach, soaking up rays, playing in the ocean and watching the stunning sunset.

Feb. 13, 2022: Maks Chmerkovskiy surprises Peta Murgatroyd on Valentine's Day

Chmerkovskiy pulled quite the romantic gesture for his big 2022 Valentine's Day surprise. After telling his wife that he was in Ukraine, he surprised her and Shai at home!

"I was in complete shock, we had just been speaking on the phone, with him telling me he was driving back to his hotel in the freezing cold in Ukraine," Murgatroyd detailed on Instagram. "Lol. Liar!!! Big lies!!!"

She continued, "He had flown overnight and told me that he had a long work day and wouldn't be able to talk for most of it. More Lies!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏èThis was the BEST SURPRISE EVER!!! My forever valentine."

Feb. 24, 2022: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd ask for prayers amid the Ukraine invasion

Murgatroyd asked for prayers and well wishes for her husband who was in Ukraine amid Russia's invasion.

"Please pray for my husband Maks. I don't usually ask these things from my social media network, however today is extremely hard and the next few will be even harder," the DWTS pro wrote on Instagram.

March 2, 2022: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd reunite at LAX after his return from Ukraine

Chmerkovskiy arrived in Los Angeles on March 2 after spending several days in Ukraine amid the ongoing war with Russia. The couple was spotted sharing an emotional embrace during their reunion at LAX.

Prior to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Chmerkovskiy had been serving as a judge while filming the country's World of Dance series. As he tried to return home, he documented his journey on social media.

"I'm a big boy, but I know for a fact that I'm going through something mentally ... because I get into these cry moments, I'm emotional, I can't control it," he said during Good Morning America following his return.

"I cried from the airport, I felt embarrassed ... the entire ride back cause I was the only man on the train amongst all women and children," Chmerkovskiy added.

March 31, 2022: Maks Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd enjoy family time

After being reunited, Murgatroyd shared a sweet video of her husband playing with Shai.

"Thank god Papa is home‚Ä¶now my back can heal ü§£üôèüèª@maksimc #MumIsTakingABreak," she captioned the cute clip.

June 21, 2022: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy open up about expanding their family

Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy opened up in an intimate interview with PEOPLE about the challenges they've faced while trying to grow their family of three.

After years of wanting to expand their family, the Peta Jane Beauty founder traveled overseas to visit Chmerkovskiy in hopes of conceiving a baby ‚Äî but after contracting COVID during her trip, Murgatroyd says her body was unable to fight off the illness and sustain the very early stages of her pregnancy.

Watch the full episode of People Features: Peta Murgatroyd & Maksim Chmerkovskiy below or on the PeopleTV app.

Murgatroyd revealed that she suffered a miscarriage, her third over the past two years. "I felt like I was dying, but then I obviously knew what had happened," she said. "It was just all too much for my body and I couldn't do it. I couldn't believe that this was happening to me."

"I try to do my best in supporting Peta. I'm a changed man because of this experience," Chmerkovskiy added.

The couple revealed that they were working with a team of fertility doctors and have started the process of in vitro fertilization.

July 20, 2022: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy walk the red carpet at the ESPY Awards

The couple stepped out for the 30th Annual ESPY Awards, hosted by Steph Curry at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, marking the first event they've attended since Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy opened up to PEOPLE last month about their fertility journey.

August 23, 2022: Peta Murgatroyd says embryo transfer with Maks Chmerkovskiy wasn't successful

Murgatroyd revealed in an Instagram video that the embryo transfer from the first round of in-vitro fertilization with Chmerkovskiy was not successful.

She wrote in her caption, "I promised you all that I would be open and honest. I had times where I was unsure of that decision throughout my IVF journey and even more so after we got the news that our transfer did not work. But going back on my word after being such an open book wouldn't be right."

In the video, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy were shown their embryo under a microscope for the first time. "This moment caught me off guard," she wrote over the video. "Seeing my baby got me so emotional. Everything felt so right."

Murgatroyd added that finding out the transfer wasn't successful, just 10 days after seeing her embryo, was "one of the saddest moments I'll never forget."

She continued, "That part was a moment in time where I saw my baby. It felt final, it felt like this was it," she said. "I got a little preview of them at the earliest stage of their life. It felt otherworldly special, I felt privileged. I really did think this was going to work."

She concluded the post with, "I will get my baby, just not right now," adding, "And to all the women who have gone through this multiple times over, I bow down. You're warriors and you give me strength everyday. This s--- ain't easy."

September 9, 2022: Peta Murgatroyd says return to DWTS is helping her find happiness after IVF struggles

ABC and Disney+ announced in early September 2022 that Murgatroyd was returning to Dancing with the Stars with partner Jason Lewis. Speaking with reporters at a DWTS Season 31 virtual press conference, Murgatroyd explained why she wanted to return to the show.

"So much has been going on in the past year and a half with Maks [Chmerkovskiy] and myself and our family," she said. "Maks was in Ukraine with the war and then me with constant miscarriages, and now one failed [round of] IVF."

"I just took it upon myself to really go back to my roots," the dancer added. "After this first IVF failed, I was like, 'What do I want to do? Where am I most happiest so I can get through this and just feel good about life?' And I realized that I've just really missed dancing."

November 14, 2022: Peta Murgatroyd shares sweet throwback family portrait

Murgatroyd shared an adorable family photo on Instagram in which she and Chmerkovskiy wear matching leather jackets while Shai squints his eyes in a big smile. In the caption, she explained the story behind the black-and-white throwback photo.

"I thought for some reason all black leather jackets would be a good idea‚Ä¶ it was not," the DWTS dancer wrote. "Shai refused to wear his and we both looked like wannabe Grease groupies üò´ So I canned the entire look and ended the shoot lol‚Ä¶the best thing was THIS was the only usable photo and Shai looks hella cute !!!"

January 13, 2023: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy announce they are expecting

Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy told PEOPLE that they are expecting their second child, following months of fertility challenges.

"All natural, it happened," Murgatroyd said. "I didn't even know I was pregnant for so long until I was really feeling sick. I danced through Dancing with the Stars with it. I started feeling weird, started feeling a little bit sick and a little bloated and I didn't want to test for weeks."

After finally taking a test, the dancer admitted she was "skeptical." She said, "I didn't even tell Maks for a while."

April 2, 2023: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy share footage from their babymoon

Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy posted a video on Instagram that showed them traveling to Los Cabos, Mexico, and enjoying a day at the beach. In the clip, their son Shai was seen smiling and running in the sand while Murgatroyd showed off her baby bump in a bikini.

"Our baby moon has officially begun ü§∞‚Ä¶.we literally couldn't bare to go to Shai's fave vacay city without him so‚Ä¶.here we all are!!! üòù," Chmerkovskiy captioned the post.

Two days later, the expectant mother shared an "Instagram vs. Reality" video with images of herself posing in a beige bikini followed by a clip of her enjoying a side of fries. "Let's be real for a second‚Ä¶ ü§£ those fries didn't stand a chance!" she joked in the caption.

April 27, 2023: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy reveal the sex of baby No. 2

In a dance video on Instagram, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy revealed that they're expecting a baby boy.

"The Chmerkovskiy's as a whole are creating their own soccer team LOL! We're so elated that Shai will get a baby brother and cannot wait to meet this little guy," the couple captioned a joint post. "He is already measuring quite large üò¨ and loves to kick mummy in the ribs at all hours of the night!"

They added: "We will have a house FULL of boys, including our little Hachi! I guess this means we have to try for baby number 3 to get that girl ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüôà."

June 18, 2023: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy welcome their second child

Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd welcomed their second child, son Rio John, on Father's Day 2023. The little bundle of joy arrived at 2:06 p.m. and weighed 8 lbs., 6 oz.

‚ÄúWe loved Rio, which we came upon at the last minute. It‚Äôs a perfect complement to our long surname!" Murgatroyd told PEOPLE, adding that his middle name, John, is in honor of her late father.

Chmerkovskiy initially shared the couple's baby news on Instagram.

"Happy Father‚Äôs Day to me!" he wrote, adding a cheeky remark: "#MadeInPeta."

July 8, 2023: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy celebrate six years of marriage

In honor of their sixth wedding anniversary, Murgatroyd gave her husband a sweet shout-out on Instagram.

"Love of my life @maksimc. Happy Anniversary my favorite human‚Ä¶6 years married 10 years together," she wrote. "You‚Äôre without a doubt my best friend on planet Earth, my love for you is infinite."

In a separate Instagram post, Chmerkovskiy said: "Easily the absolute best decision I‚Äôve ever made and I would marry you everyday of my life. I love you infinitely more today than on our wedding day and can‚Äôt even fathom how that‚Äôs possible because I clearly remember bursting with love when you walked towards me."

February 5, 2024: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy are expecting baby No. 3

Just seven months after welcoming their second son, Rio, the couple announced their third pregnancy.

"We Are Having A Baby," Chmerkovskiy and Murgatroyd wrote on Instagram. "Yes we know‚Ä¶we just had a baby‚Ä¶haha! This was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!"

They continued: "After everything we‚Äôve been through with miscarriages and IVF we‚Äôre beyond blessed and know we are uber lucky for this miracle to happen to us."

March 21, 2024: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy announce their third child is a boy

In a video shared to both of their Instagram accounts, Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy shared clips from a family photo shoot, sharing that their third child will be a boy.

"It‚Äôs a ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.BOY! ü©µü©µü©µ I‚Äôve been quietly preparing myself to be a real-life wolf pack Mumma with our THIRD baby boy on the way üôèüèªü§£üíô," Murgatroyd wrote in her caption. "I CANNOT BELIEVE WE WILL HAVE 3 BOYS!! ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£ Maks and I are beyond happy to have another buddy for Shai and Rio‚Ä¶"

July 12, 2024: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy welcome baby No. 3
